message.title: Bottle Bank
message.content:
As soon as you've found a couple of bottles, you can return them here.
There are several of these containers on the island. They are all marked on your PDA map.

message.title: On foot
message.content:
You can only pick up bottles when you're on foot.
To travel larger distances you can drive a vehicle, of course.

message.title: Keep the Island Clean!
message.content:
When playing in the career mode you can collect and return bottles as well.
For each returned bottle you get a small fee, and your reputation on the island goes up.

message.title: Bottle Quest
message.content:
There are 100 bottles to be found in the career mode.
Alas, only in this mission the bottles are visible on your PDA map.

message.title: Reputation
message.content: Your reputation affects how much money you get back when you sell an old vehicle or implement to the farm machines trader.

message.title: A Small Hint
message.content: Some bottles can only be reached indirectly.
